title: Can Kentucky Do It?
teaser: The NCAA men's basketball tournament resumes tonight with regional games. The Kentucky Wildcats are still the favorites to win it.
contentencoded:
The NCAA men’s basketball tournament resumes tonight with regional games. The Kentucky Wildcats are still the favorites to win it. They’re undefeated and if they win the title they will be the first team to finish a season 40-0. Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca joins host Lisa Mullins with details.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
